=Header=
 * 10 bytes
|| *Offset* || *Length* || *Name* || *Description* ||
||0||1|| ceiling || 0x01 - 0x03 = no ceiling / 0x04 - 0x05 (0xFF?) = ceiling ||
||1||1|| NPC/monster count || amount of NPCs and monsters (+spare) ||
||2||1|| map type || 0x01 = 3D map, 0x02 = 2D map ||
||3||1|| unknown || unknown ||
||4||1|| x dim || map x dimension ||
||5||1|| y dim || map y dimension ||
||6||1|| labdata || labdata id ||
||7||1|| music || background music id ||
||8||1|| palette || map palette (0x01 - 0x38) ||
||9||1|| unknown || unknown ||

= NPC/monster events =
 * 10 bytes per event
 * overall: npc/monster count `*` 10 bytes
|| *Offset* || *Length* || *Name* || *Description* ||
1 = npc nummer/zuordnung (wenn 0, dann kein npc sondern dummy objekt)
2 = ?
3+4 = evtl. event?
5 = objekt nummer (-> labdata)
6-7 = ?
8 = bewegungs art: (wenn bit 1 und/oder 2 gesetzt, dann random?, )
	bit 1: wenn bit 1 und/oder 2 gesetzt, dann random?, ansonsten gibt es eine 0x900 Bytes ...
	bit 2: ... gro§e struktur hinter den event daten anstelle der start-pos (bewegungsinformationen?)
	bit 3: unbekannt? manchmal gesetzt, wenn bit1+2 nicht gesetzt sind
9-10 = ?

= actual map data =
 * 3 bytes per tile
 * overall: x dim `*` y dim `*` 3 bytes
|| *Offset* || *Length* || *Name* || *Description* ||
||0||1|| object id || object id (object: 1 - 101; wall: 102+) ||
||1||1|| floor id || floor id ||
||2||1|| ceiling id || ceiling id||

=NPC-Pos structure=
 * x = amount of npcs/monsters]
[FOR x]
	[IF movement type & 0x3 != 0]
		[X-Pos - Byte]
		[Y-Pos - Byte]
	[ELSE]
		[FOR 0x480; 48 positions per hour or one position each 1.25 minutes]
			[X-Pos - Byte]
			[Y-Pos - Byte]
[END FOR]

=Automap Info / GoTo-Points=
[Anzahl der EintrŠge = x - word]
[FOR x (Struktur jeweils 19 Bytes)]
	[X-Pos - Byte]
	[Y-Pos - Byte]
	[??? - Byte]
	[??? - Byte]
	[Name/Text - 15 Bytes]
[END FOR]
